Class CoefficientCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.math.computational.ChebyshevRecursiveCosineMultiples
      • net.myorb.math.computational.dct.CoefficientCalculator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EvenCoefficientCalculator, UnbiasedCoefficientCalculator

    public class CoefficientCalculator
extends ChebyshevRecursiveCosineMultiples
    compute dot products over cosine harmonic series
    Author:
    Michael Druckman

      • addWithToggle

        public void addWithToggle(int multiplier)
        track even and odd sequence items. even sequence item flag toggles with each call
        Parameters:
        multiplier - the current multiplier

      • addCalculatedCoefficients

        public int addCalculatedCoefficients(int k)
        add Coefficients appropriate to index of sequence of DCT type. default version adds single toggled entry, override to add multiple entries per call
        Parameters:
        k - the starting index of the coefficients
        Returns:
        count of added coefficients
